H0.text: Budding is a part of the process of sexual reproduction.

H1.text: Regeneration is a part of the process of sexual reproduction.

H2.text: Pollination is a part of the process of sexual reproduction.

H3.text: Fragmentation is a part of the process of sexual reproduction.

A4.text: When pollination occurs between species, it can produce hybrid offspring in nature and in plant breeding work.

A5.text: Pollination is important in horticulture and agriculture, because fruiting is dependent on fertilisation: the result of pollination.
